name: Werewolf
description:
I keep falling asleep with the lights on
Waking up at ones and twos
Under a full moon
 
I dreamt about a werewolf
Then sex with an ex
Then an apocalypse or two
I don’t know why I always end
 
A friend of mine dreamt
That I saved a guy from a shipwreck
I dreamt about that same guy
Coming on to me aggressively
 
And how I ran from him
And I thought I got away
Because he did not rip my heart out
Just a nick, my lips by the skin of his teeth
 
Then the bloodied moon came
And the bloodied moon changed me
O, I begged you to choke me out
I begged to wolf you down
 
But we fell asleep with the lights on
Woke up to a cat
Howling at a full moon
 
You were the first to apologize
To blame it on that full moon
Both of our mouths stained
Tongues a fresh coat of metal
Melted molten our mouths dried shut
 
And maybe that is why we end
Why we mask the moon with tungsten shade
Why I write poems at eleven instead of sleeping
Or why I write poems at eleven because I’ve forgotten
How to sleep save the wolf

// Twitter: @blumes_
